mapper.sql: tw_id, tid, pid, pname, pcount, pshelf
mapper.select:
select
from t_warehouse order by tw_id desc limit #{startRows,jdbcType=INTEGER},10

select * from t_warehouse
and tid like concat('%', #{tid}, '%')
and pid like concat('%', #{pid}, '%')
order by tw_id desc limit #{startRows,jdbcType=INTEGER},10

select count(*) from t_warehouse
and tid like concat('%', #{tid}, '%')
and pid like concat('%', #{pid}, '%')
mapper.insert:
insert into t_warehouse
tw_id,
tid,
pid,
pname,
pcount,
pshelf,
#{twId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pshelf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_warehouse
tid = #{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pcount = #{pcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pshelf = #{pshelf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tw_id = #{twId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_warehouse set tid = #{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcount = #{pcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pshelf = #{pshelf,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tw_id = #{twId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
